channel.title: 562/657 Teleport thing
channel.description:
Hey hey so I need some help with a code..so basically I want an object to teleport you, but it doesn't allow you to teleport until you have killed a monster.
For example there is a man and a portal. Until that man dies by you, you cannot use it...any tutorials out there or maybe a simple base code I can work off.
Thanks

item.title: 562/657 Teleport thing
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Add a boolean check to that specific NPC. If it returns true then grant the player access to said portal.

I can’t provide you specific code because I’ve never used a higher revision then 317 and I haven’t a clue as to what’s different.

Read full topic
